about_the_game:
Welcome to Madame Fifi’s Bakery!

After her grandmother's passing, Madame Fifi feels called to pack her bags and move back to her grandmother's hometown. She decides to turn the house that she inherited from her grandmother into a bakery! She must cater to the friendly animal townsfolks' unique taste preferences, and interpret her grandmother's recipe book.


Bake Tasty Pastries:
Follow the steps of each recipe and bake pastries using all the different tools available! Experience a satisfying moment as there is no stress from time limits or repetitive work.


Experiment with ingredients:
Mix additional ingredients or twist the steps to find a new recipe! Make your original pastries and see what your customers think about them! Imagine all that you can create!


Show your artistic talent:
Reveal the aesthetic aspects of your pastries! Display your creations in a colorful display. It might catch the eye of new customers and attract them to the bakery!


Communicate with customers:
Build relationships with the adorable animal customers! Listen to their stories and desires and use your newly acquired knowledge to restore your recipe book, and find the best pastry for each customer. If they are satisfied, they might give you surprising gifts!

short_description: Play as the adorable cat baker, Madame Fifi, and craft the townsfolks' favorite sweet treats in this cozy baking game! Fulfill the orders of the vibrant animal village and complete the customers requests of scrumptious baked goods with satisfying gameplay!
